1.0.0.name: connect20/Grizzly_Productaction
1.0.0.description: Mass Product Actions by GrizzlySTS is designed to allow the administrator to bulk update attributes like price, status,Custom options, product images, visibility and many more using one click at admin. This simple plugin has a narrow scope and gets the job done.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
